GSD.product_version: versions from v4.15 to before v4.19.257
GSD.description:
scsi: storvsc: Remove WQ_MEM_RECLAIM from storvsc_error_wq

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.257 by commit b692c238ddfa61f00d97c4c1f021425d132ba96f, it was introduced in version v4.15 by commit 436ad941335386c5fc7faa915a8fbdfe8c908084. For more details please see the references link.
